title: Connection Issues
body:
Hi,

So I went into a normal ranked game this morning, and around 30 minutes in I dc'd. When I tried to reconnect I got the error "unable to connect to the server." I then tried to restart my computer, router and the league client, all didn't fix the issue. According to OP.GG the game is still ongoing, over an hour later, which seems quite unlikely considering it is supposedly a 4v5. Any help is appreciated!

replies.body:
Hey there,

Sounds like you're experiencing what is known as a Ghost Game, these are caused when the client/server doesn't receive the proper "End Game" message.

These aren't something you can fix yourself, nor can Riot. You just have to wait it out, the issue will resolve itself within a couple hours.
